mapper.insert:
insert into admin_today_price (booth_id, food_id, price_date, price, special_price) VALUES
(#{item.boothId}, #{item.foodId}, #{item.priceDate}, #{item.price}, #{item.specialPrice}) ;
mapper.select: select a.id, a.price, a.special_price, b.name as foodName, c.`name` as boothName, a.`price_date` from `admin_today_price` a left join `admin_food` b on b.id = a.food_id left join `admin_booth` c on c.id = a.`booth_id`
